Package it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel

Class Heavifier

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.Heavifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Heavifier extends Object implements Serializable
This class is used to convert LightObject present in the LightModel to the corresponding Object present in the Model
See Also:

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Placement
    heavify(LightPlacement lightPlacement, CardTable cardTable)
    Given a lightPlacement containing a CardInHand, it heavifies it
    static CardInHand
    heavifyCardInHand(LightCard lightCard, CardTable cardTable)
    Given a lightCard, it searches for the ID in the CardLookUpGoldCard or in the CardLookUpResourceCard in the cardTable and returns it
    static ObjectiveCard
    heavifyObjectCard(LightCard lightCard, CardTable cardTable)
    Given a lightCard, it searches for the ID in the CardLookUpObjective in the cardTable and returns the ObjectiveCard
    static StartCard
    heavifyStartCard(LightCard lightCard, CardTable cardTable)
    Given a lightCard, it searches for the ID in the CardLookUpStartCard in the cardTable and returns the StartCard
    static Placement
    heavifyStartCardPlacement(LightPlacement lightPlacement, CardTable cardTable)
    Given a lightPlacement containing a StartCard, it heavifies it

  • Method Details

    • heavifyObjectCard

      public static ObjectiveCard heavifyObjectCard(LightCard lightCard, CardTable cardTable)
      Given a lightCard, it searches for the ID in the CardLookUpObjective in the cardTable and returns the ObjectiveCard
      Parameters:
      lightCard - the lightCard to be heavified
      cardTable - the cardTable containing all the CardLookUp objects
      Returns:
      the ObjectiveCard corresponding to the lightCard

    • heavifyStartCard

      public static StartCard heavifyStartCard(LightCard lightCard, CardTable cardTable)
      Given a lightCard, it searches for the ID in the CardLookUpStartCard in the cardTable and returns the StartCard
      Parameters:
      lightCard - the lightCard to be heavified
      cardTable - the cardTable containing all the CardLookUp objects
      Returns:
      the StartCard corresponding to the lightCard

    • heavifyCardInHand

      public static CardInHand heavifyCardInHand(LightCard lightCard, CardTable cardTable)
      Given a lightCard, it searches for the ID in the CardLookUpGoldCard or in the CardLookUpResourceCard in the cardTable and returns it
      Parameters:
      lightCard - the lightCard to be heavified
      cardTable - the cardTable containing all the CardLookUp objects
      Returns:
      the GoldCard corresponding to the lightCard

    • heavify

      public static Placement heavify(LightPlacement lightPlacement, CardTable cardTable)
      Given a lightPlacement containing a CardInHand, it heavifies it
      Parameters:

      cardTable - the cardTable containing all the CardLookUp objects
      Returns:
      the heavified Placement
